```py
>>> numbers = [0, 1, 2]
>>> colors = ['green', 'purple']
>>> pd.MultiIndex.from_product([numbers, colors],
...                            names=['number', 'color'])
MultiIndex([(0,  'green'),
 (0, 'purple'),
 (1,  'green'),
 (1, 'purple'),
 (2,  'green'),
 (2, 'purple')],
 names=['number', 'color']) 
```
